channel.title: Need some help. [DELTA]
channel.description:
1. My Lunar is working on DeltaScape with my client but, I need Astral Runes to cast Lunar spell. The ID is 553 but it's not Astral runes and doesnt work with Lunar. How can I fix that ?
2. When my server goes offline and I need to do an update, I restart it and right after I restart is, my client disapear at same time. How can I fix this that when I restart my server, my client don't close ?
If I got more questions, I'll post them.
Thanks if you help me.

item.title: Need some help. [DELTA]
item.dc:creator: @Maximum_ZxZ Maximum ZxZ
item.description:
@Maximum_ZxZ wrote:

Thanks and can you give me the sprites of the model of Astral Runes please ?

Read full topic

item.title: Need some help. [DELTA]
item.dc:creator: @duces_mane duces mane
item.description:
@duces_mane wrote:

  1. you need to look for the astral runes code. if its not there, then you need to add them into your sever, download the models etc.
  2. your client is going to disapear. first off thats good because it might need to update something and your client needs to restart for that, other than that i do not know. thats not really a big deal tbh.
    hope this helped

Read full topic
